text: wqal hwla' almushrikun min qrysh: law sha' alrhmn ma eabadna ahdana min dwnh, whdhh hujat batlt, faqad 'aqam allah alhujat ealaa aleibad bi'iirsal alrusul w'inzal alktb, fahtjajhm bialqada' walqadar min abtl albatil min baed 'indhar alrusul lhm. maa lahum bhqyqt ma yaqulun min dhlk min elm, wa'iinama yqwlwnh tkhrrusana wkdhbana; li'anah la khabar eindahum min allah bdhlk wala brhan
